problem: 如图,在▱ABCD中,AC、BD相交于点O,点E、F分别在边AD、BC上,EF经过点O．如果AB=3,BC=5,EF=AB,那么四边形CDEF的周长为()
answer: 解:∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴CD=AB=3,AD=BC=5,OA=OC,AD∥BC,∴∠EAO=∠FCO,∠AEO=∠CFO,在△AOE和△COF中,≥ft\{\begin{matrix}∠EAO=∠FCO&\\AEO=∠CFO&\\OA=OC&\\\end{matrix}\right.\,∴△AOE≌△COF(AAS)．∴OF=OE,CF=AE．∴四边形CDEF的周长=CD+DE+EF+CF=CD+AB+DE+AE=CD+AB+AD=3+3+5=11；故选:D．
comment: 本题考查了平行四边形的性质和全等三角形的判定以及全等三角形的性质,熟练掌握平行四边形的性质,证明三角形全等是解题的关键．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, in ▱ABCD, AC and BD intersect at point O, points E and F are on edges AD and BC respectively, and EF passes through point O. If AB = N_0, BC = N_1, EF = AB, then the perimeter of the quadrilateral CDEF is ()
